Horse racing is an equestrian sport that: Horse racing is an equestrian sport that has existed for many centuries. It has been popular since the two-wheel chariot race in Roman times. As far as Japan is concerned, it has more than 20 large-scale horse racing courses with 100000 people, holding more than 15000 races every year. In addition to the admiration of chivalry in the race, gambling also allows more people to participate, making horse racing active among civilians.
META HORSE integrates horse racing cultu: META HORSE integrates horse racing culture into the concept of metaverse, so that everyone has the opportunity to become a horse owner. From breeding to competition, META HORSE creates a comprehensive and realistic horse racing chain game based on the details of real horse racing.
By combining users\/operations and \"bet: By combining users/operations and "betting systems" into an economic zone that is accessible to NFT owners, non-owners and even other platform users, a complete ecosystem has been successfully put into place.
With PVE and PVP multiple gameplay, play: With PVE and PVP multiple gameplay, players can experience the fun of raising horses
Players can freely choose to improve the: Players can freely choose to improve the attributes of horses and create a chain tour with the greatest degree of freedom
Turn on the breeding mode, so that playe: Turn on the breeding mode, so that players can produce their own horse NFT
Players can participate in the Super Met: Players can participate in the Super Metahorse Competition by betting to win prizes
TGE Mode, 100% & monthly release for 12: TGE Mode, 100% & monthly release for 12 months
